snippet: The White House now wants a law to protect journalists from government intrusion.
abstract: Editorial notes that Obama administration has come out in support of media shield law even as it has come under scorching bipartisan criticism for secretly going through phone records of reporters at The Associated Press; underscores necessity of such a law, but questions whether it would have protected AP from this intrusion by administration.
lead_paragraph: The White House now wants a law to protect journalists from government intrusion.

headline.seo: After Attacking The A.P., a Peace Offering
headline.main: After Attacking The A.P., a Peace Offering
headline.print_headline: After Attacking The A.P., a Peace Offering
